channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KS

item.title: Report X-2023070647
item.description:
Report X-2023070647

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE QA WAS WORKING IN THEIR AREA, A CUSHMAN DRIVER BROUGHT THIS PACKAGE OVER AND GAVE IT TO THEM. QA NOTICED THIS PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND PLACED IT IN A TOTE LINED WIHT A HAZMAT BAG AND PLACED IN THE HAZMAT PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THREE OF THE BOTTLES ARE CRUSHED IN FROM THE PACKAGE BEING DROPPED. THE PACKAGE HAD NO DIAMOND LABELS ON THE OUTSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE LINED WITH A CLEAR, LARGE HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023070632
item.description:
Report X-2023070632

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE QA WAS WORKING, A CUSHMAN DRIVER BROUGHT THE PACKAGE OVER TO THEM AND INDICATED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A TOTE WITH A LINED HAZMAT BAG AND PLACED THE PACKAGE IN THE HAZMAT PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS LOADED ON ITS SIDE AND HAD NO DIRECTIONAL ARROWS AND NO DIAMOND MARKINGS ON THE OUTSIDE. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE WITH A LINED HAZMAT BAG AND PLACED IN THE PROCESSING CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023070592
item.description:
Report X-2023070592

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WHILE QA DID A DOCK WALK, THEY NOTICED THIS PACKAGE WAS IN A TOTE LEAKING. QA GRABBED A TOTE LINED WITH A CLEAR, LARGE HAZMAT BAG AND PLACED THE CONTENTS INSIDE. THE BOX HAD NO MARKINGS ON IT FOR DIRECTIONAL ARROWS OR LIMITED QUANTITY. THEY NOTICED IT HAD A STRONG ODOR (ACIDIC) AND PLACED IN THE HAZMAT PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE WAS DROPPED AND CAUSED THE CONTAINERS TO BECOME CRUSHED IN. PLUS, THE PACKAGE HAD NO DIRECTIONAL ARROWS ON IT STATING WHICH WAY THE BOTTLES WERE FACING. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A TOTE WITH A CLEAR, LARGE HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023070105
item.description:
Report X-2023070105

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-01T03:13:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SUPERVISOR RADIO IN HAZMAT LEAKER TO THE DMP. DMP DISPATCHED RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED AT THE LEAKER AND CONSULTED THE DECISION TREE ON HOW TO RESPOND TO THE LEAKER. FOLLOWING THE CORRECT METHODS OULTLINED IN THE DECISION TREE THE RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER THEN BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO DMP FOR APPRIATE DIPOSAL PROCEDURE

item.title: Report X-2023061736
item.description:
Report X-2023061736

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: MANAGER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS THEN TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: BOTH BOTTLES HAD LOOSE/MISSING CAPS AND LEAKED OUT SOILING THE BOX. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.

item.title: Report X-2023061679
item.description:
Report X-2023061679

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-25
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE HANDLER NOTICED THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND NOTIFIED THE MANAGER THE MANAGER THEN NOTIFIED QA. QA PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED TOTE AND CLEANED UP THE SPILL. THE PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO THE PROCESSING CAGE. DescribePack: ALL FOUR BOTTLES WERE LEAKING OUT FROM AROUND THE CAPS. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE.
